ratings.comment: Baughman is an incredible lecturer.  Makes dull topics come to life, and he is extremely energetic and hilarious.  He is an old school prof and can hold attention.  The reading for the class is insane, do it or you will struggle.  Sometimes there would be a comment thrown that was borderline offensive but he's an older gent so keep that in mind.

Hands down favorite professor in the Journalism school. Baughman makes up for his odd comments throughout lectures with fantastic help on your writing, and for a class on creative non-fiction, he gives both great and horrible examples for class-wide critique. Speak up in class, and go to his office hours, you won't regret it! Must love Pez.

I absolutely loved Prof Baugh as a professor. He was a great lecturer and always got people laughing. He clearly knows his stuff and communicates to the class in a clear and concise way. The class is pretty old-school - no laptops, he doesn't use a powerpoint or anything, just lectures from a podium. Not as difficult as I thought it would be.

Very interesting and funny guy.  Great lecturer. Class did not cover as much material as I thought it would, we never got to Watergate. As a history major the class was not as challenging as I thought it would be. Felt watered down compared to other upper level history classes. Section was mostly the TA just explaining the readings, not discussion.

Professor Baughman is the best. He's not only hilarious, but he really knows his stuff (he's a graduate of Harvard and Columbia). He makes the dense history of Mass Communication really interesting, and I'm so glad I took this class. Be sure to visit him during office hours, too! He gives you pez.
Best Professor I have ever had. Intelligent, passionate, entertaining, educational, helpful, funny.

Prof. Baughman is, hands down, the best and most inspirational teacher I've had during my time at UW. I had him for a creative non-fiction class, and I'm being completely honest when I say I looked forward to every class.  Wish I could have taken more classes of his while I was in school!

I would very highly recommend Prof Baughman to anyone who is willing to read a lot and go to lecture. He has an old-fashioned style of teaching with no powerpoint or handouts, and we read 6 fairly hard books, but going to class is a pleasure. Baughman is funny, vivacious, and very well-prepared every day.
Fantastic man. He's hilarious, intelligent, helpful and very easy to talk to. There are a lot of readings and the exams aren't great, but having him as a professor makes it all worth it.

Love him!  He's hilarious and great in lecture.  You can tell he really likes his work and he's not afraid to make fun of everyone to keep you interested.  I highly recommend taking any course with him. PS:  It's JAMES Baughman, not RICHARD.
Great professor!SO hilarious. Take this class, it is soo worth it. There are a lot of readings but they really aren't that bad, I swear. Well, some of them, don't bother reading others.

Wow....I am so glad I got to have this professor!  I learned alot, and it was a real joy to have him.  VERY funny, charismatic, friendly, does great impressions.  Be prepared for a lot of reading however!
